results.title: Metformin Ameliorates 2.856 GHz Microwave- Radiation-Induced Reproductive Impairments in Male Rats via Inhibition of Oxidative Stress and Apoptosis
results.text_hl: These findings demonstrated that exposure to 2.856 GHz microwave radiation induces obvious @<m>DISEASE_Myopathies_Structural_Congenital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020914 @@@structural and functional impairments@@@ of the male reproductive system, and suggested that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can function as a promising antioxidant to inhibit microwave-radiation-induced harmful effects by inhibiting oxidative stress and apoptosis.

citations.NLM: Men J, Zhang L, Peng R, Li Y, Li M, Wang H, Zhao L, Zhang J, Wang H, Xu X, Dong J, Wang J, Yao B, Guo J. Metformin Ameliorates 2.856 GHz Microwave- Radiation-Induced Reproductive Impairments in Male Rats via Inhibition of Oxidative Stress and Apoptosis Int J Mol Sci. 2023 Jul 31;24(15):. PMID: 37569626
